title: Meesakaara Nanba Lyrics Natpukkaga
stanzas:
meesakaara nanba
unaku rosa adhigam da

meesakaara nanba
unaku rosa adhigam da
rosam adhigam da
adhavida paasam adhigam da

namma palaginadha marakkalaye
andha paruvam ippo
kedaikkalaye
adha kaatchigalukku naraiyillaye
innum kanna
vittuthaan marayalaye
meesakaara nanba

andha aaththangaya
kaettu paaru
meen pudichcha kadhaya
adhu sollum

andha panna maetta
kaettupaaru
paal karandha kadha
adhu solum

andha sola kaatta
kaettupaaru kodi
pudichcha kadha
adhu sollum

andha toorin taaxisa
kaettupaaru padam
paartha kadha adhu
sollum

karnam pottu kenathukkul
kudhichcha ninaivugal
malarudhu manasukkul
kulirudhu..

kamban koolu kudichidathaane
unarvugal thudikkudhu
meesayum thadhukkudhu

palaginadha marakkalaye
andha paruvam ippo
kedaikkalaye
adha kaatchigalukku naraiyillaye
innum kanna
vittuthaan marayalaye

peththa appana pola
akkara vachchi
senja sevaikkellaam
vilaiyillaye

andha anbu neranja
pulla paasam
ada unnapola than
enakkillaye…

indha veedhi mulukka
thoranam katti…
kann mulichathellaam
edhukkaaga..

naan peththa ponnuthaan
vazha vendi nee
ulachadhellaam enakkaaga

karnan pola kadamaya madhichu
dhinam dhinam ulachchavan
vervaya vadichchavan

paattukaaran bharathi sonna
kannana pola enakingu porandhavan

kannu renduthaan
kalangudhaiyyaa
enna punniyam senjen
unai adaiya

nandri kadan theerkka
enna koduppen
un velakkaaranaaga
vandhu porappen..

meesakaara nanba
unaku rosa adhigam da

meesakaara nanba
unaku rosa adhigam da
rosam adhigam da
adhavida paasam adhigam da

namma palaginadha marakkalaye
andha paruvam ippo
kedaikkalaye
adha kaatchigalukku naraiyillaye
innum kanna
vittuthaan marayalaye

seo.title: Meesakaara Nanba Lyrics Natpukkaga
seo.description: Get the complete Meesakaara Nanba Lyrics Natpukkaga from Natpukkaga. Read the lyrics penned by Kavignar Kalidasan and composed by Deva and sung by Deva. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Kavignar Kalidasan, Natpukkaga, Deva, Deva, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
